PATIENT_3.name: PATIENT_3
PATIENT_3.description: This table supplements the information contained in the PATIENT table. It contains basic information about patients, such as the patient's ID, occupation, English fluency, etc.

columns.name: PAT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the patient record for this row. This column is frequently used to link to the PATIENT table.

columns.name: ALRG_LAST_UPDA_DTTM
columns.description: The latest instant in which allergies were updated.

columns.name: PREFERRED_NAME
columns.description: The preferred name for the patient.
